short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save ChatGPT conversations to multiple file formats, txt,pdf,md and save to clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is powerful, easy to install and operate. It helps you store your conversation content on your computer and then you can share your ChatGPT document experience with your friends.

*** Its features ***
1. Multiple formats: Support TXT, PDF, MD, allowing you to obtain exquisite and professional documents in a variety of different formats.
2. One-Click Save: Hit the extension icon on your toolbar and watch the magic happen, then you will get what you want.
3. No-Disturb: It does not affect the continuation of your conversation. You can continue your conversation after saving the operation.

*** Main Functions ***
- Save To TXT
- Save To PDF
- Save To Markdown
- Save To Clipboard

*** Update History ***
Updated on October 11, 2024 (version 1.0.4):
- Fixed the issue where the semi-hidden floating icon could not be displayed after the ChatGPT website was updated
Updated on August 16, 2024 (version 1.0.3):
- Fixed bug that welcome page opens automatically
Updated on August 6, 2024 (version 1.0.2):
- Easier operation: added a semi-hidden floating icon to the right of the chatGPT webpage
- Fixed bug that caused an error when canceling a save

Powered by savechatgpt.com. We will continue to update and upgrade to help you get a better and better experience. If you have any questions about SAVE ChatGPT, please contact us at support@savechatgpt.com.
